page.title: 07The Tricorn Shopping Complex
page.content:
The Tricorn Centre, voted 3rd most ugly building in Europe, consists of spiralling concrete above shops.
"The Tricorn Centre, a horrible place, Lacks all beauty and has no grace. Grey concrete walls weathered and worn Spray-paint graffiti's been drawn. You have to drive up a spiral ramp At least two storeys high To reach the dingy car park Way up in the sky. Avoiding steep ramps and bollards You pay to park your car. Use the stairs to descend You'll be walking very far. The other way to leave the park Is by lifts, both dank and dark. To the ground you do descend, Reach the shops, with money to spend." -V.Powell,C.Leaman: Portsmouth High School
